frontend.title: E-Commerce Dashboard
frontend.description: A modern, responsive dashboard for managing e-commerce operations with real-time analytics, inventory management, and customer insights. Built with React and TypeScript for optimal performance.
frontend.challenges: Implementing real-time data visualization and responsive design across multiple screen sizes.

frontend.title: Portfolio Website
frontend.description: A sleek, animated portfolio website showcasing creative projects with smooth transitions and interactive elements. Features dark mode and responsive design.
frontend.challenges: Creating smooth 3D animations while maintaining performance across devices.

backend.title: Task Management API
backend.description: RESTful API for task management with user authentication, real-time notifications, and advanced filtering. Includes comprehensive documentation and testing suite.
backend.challenges: Implementing real-time notifications and optimizing database queries for large datasets.

backend.title: Authentication Microservice
backend.description: Scalable authentication service with OAuth integration, rate limiting, and security best practices. Supports multiple authentication providers.
backend.challenges: Ensuring security compliance and handling high-volume authentication requests.

mobile.title: Fitness Tracker App
mobile.description: Cross-platform mobile app for tracking workouts, nutrition, and progress with social features. Includes offline support and data synchronization.
mobile.challenges: Implementing offline-first architecture and smooth animations on both iOS and Android.

mobile.title: Weather App
mobile.description: Beautiful weather application with location-based forecasts, interactive maps, and customizable widgets. Features smooth animations and intuitive UI.
mobile.challenges: Integrating multiple weather APIs and creating smooth map interactions.

fullstack.title: Social Media Platform
fullstack.description: Full-featured social media platform with real-time messaging, content sharing, and advanced privacy controls. Includes admin dashboard and analytics.
fullstack.challenges: Scaling real-time features and implementing complex privacy controls.

fullstack.title: E-Learning Platform
fullstack.description: Comprehensive e-learning platform with video streaming, progress tracking, and interactive quizzes. Includes payment integration and course management.
fullstack.challenges: Optimizing video streaming performance and implementing secure payment processing.
